MasterCSS.mqtt package¶

Submodules¶

MasterCSS.mqtt.publish module¶

publish.py contains mqtt publish logic for MP.

class MasterCSS.mqtt.publish.Publisher¶

Bases: object

Class that contains publish logic. when given a payload and route it will publish to the correct route.

convertImageToByteArray(file_name)¶

converts user’s image into byte array to be published :return: bytes of the image :rtype: array of bytes

fr_publish(file_name, qos)¶
initialises client and binds functions, publish user’s image

for facial recognition as payload to AP at a given topic and disconnects.

Parameters

  • file_name (string) – filename being published

  • qos (integer) – quality of service level to use

on_connect(client, userdata, rc)¶

callback function to run on_connect

Parameters

  • client (Client) – the mqtt client

  • userdata – the private user data as set in Client()

or user_data_set() :type userdata: [type]

Parameters

rc (int) – connection result

on_disconnect(client, userdata, rc)¶

function to run on disconnect

Parameters

  • client (Client) – the mqtt client

  • userdata – the private user data as set in Client()

or user_data_set() :type userdata: [type]

Parameters

rc (int) – disconnection result

on_publish(client, userdata, result)¶

callback function to run on successful publish

Parameters

  • client (Client) – the client instance for this callback

  • userdata – the private user data as set in Client()

or user_data_set() :type userdata: [type]

Parameters

result (String) – Data being published

publish(topic, payload, qos)¶
initialises client and binds functions, publish received payload to AP

at a given topic and disconnects.

Parameters

  • topic (string) – topic to publish to

  • payload – the item that’s being sent,

will be converted into json. :type payload: any

Parameters

qos (integer) – quality of service level to use

send_end(client, filename, topic, qos)¶

sends end of file to identify image sent for facial recognition

Parameters

client – sends header to identify image sent

for facial recognition :type client: Client

Parameters

  • filename (string) – name of the file that’s being sent

  • topic (string) – topic to publish to

  • qos (integer) – quality of service level to use

send_header(client, filename, topic, qos)¶

sends header to identify image sent for facial recognition

Parameters

client – sends header to identify image

sent for facial recognition :type client: Client

Parameters

  • filename (string) – name of the file that’s being sent

  • topic (string) – topic to publish to

  • qos (integer) – quality of service level to use

MasterCSS.mqtt.subscribe module¶

subscribe.py contains mqtt subscribe logic for MP.

class MasterCSS.mqtt.subscribe.Subscriber¶

Bases: object

A class to initiate a subscriber via MQTT topic

on_connect(client, userdata, flags, rc)¶

A callback function that is called when the client connects to a broker, a specified address

Parameters

  • client (Client) – the client instance for this callback

  • userdata – the private user data as

set in Client() or user_data_set() :type userdata: any

Parameters

  • flags (dict) – response flags sent by the broker

  • rc (integer) – result of connection

on_log(client, userdata, level, buf)¶

Support function run for logging

Parameters

  • client (Client) – the client instance for this callback

  • userdata – the private user data as set in Client() or

user_data_set() :type userdata: any

Parameters

level (MQTT_LOG_INFO, MQTT_LOG_NOTICE, MQTT_LOG_WARNING,) – severity of the message

MQTT_LOG_ERR, MQTT_LOG_DEBUG

Parameters

buf (bytes) – message buffer

on_message(client, userdata, msg)¶

handles unlock/return car logic when receiving payload at a given topic

Parameters

  • client (Client) – the client instance for this callback

  • userdata – the private user data as set in Client()

or user_data_set() :type userdata: any

Parameters

msg – an instance of MQTTMessage. This is a class with members

topic, payload, qos, retain. :type msg: MQTTMessage

subscribe()¶

Initiates a MQTT Client, connects and listens for publishes to a specified topic

Carshare
